products.title: Day & Night Effortless Red
products.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

products.title: Palate Pillarbox Red Roller Blind
products.description: The palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Ruby Red Aluminium Venetian
products.description: Aluminium venetian blinds are perfect for controlling the light coming into your home, along with adding privacy and a stylish finish to your window. In a range of colours, these blinds are perfect for any decor. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Amor Rouge Roller Blind
products.description: A bold, commanding crimson, the amor rouge is so luxuriously rich that you will need a prenup before installing it. Being a bit of a diva, the rouge's darker red tone works much better in more neutral environments where it can really stand out and steal the show. Perfectly complimenting white, grey and beige walls, feel free to hang it up in any room you need extra some extra class. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Scarlet Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The scarlet venetian blind has a red metallic finish to it, helping make this blind something special. Use this alongside light and neutral colours to help make this blind standout in your home. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Rich Red Aluminium Venetian
products.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

products.title: Juicy Berry Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The rich pink colour of the juicy berry venetian blind is striking and beautiful. The strong pink tone is slightly darker than a barbie pink, so can be used in more rooms than you might think. Pair this with creams or greys to really compliment this bold colour. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Lux Raspberry Vertical Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being dimout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Kerry Boysenberry Roller Blind
products.description: This gorgeous purple is what you would imagine the king of the aubergines to be. Royal and dignified, but with a restraint that shows his benevolence, he is the most beloved of all the vegetable kings. All his magnificence is present in this blind, from the rich colour that diplomatically cooperates with a variety of palette and decor designs to the steadfast defense of his realm from harsh sunlight that fades sofas and melts ice cream.

products.title: Kerry Fresh Strawberry Roller Blind
products.description: The colour you see when you get cut off at an intersection, the gorgeous kerry fresh strawberry is a physical manifestation of that burning anger that just feels so damn good. Ideal for rooms rocking warm colours, like other reds, oranges and browns, you could also use it to heat up a cooler colour palette and add some fire to your life. Being blackout as well, it gives you total darkness and privacy as you smash lamps and write angry reviews of restaurants on yelp.

products.title: Gibson Persian Blue Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, teal blue coloured gibson persian blue would work brilliantly against a neutral background to help highlight the colour in this blind. This is a beautiful colour and great for anyone looking for a teal roller blind. Use this blind to lift and enhance a room - especially a bathroom as this 100% waterproof fabric can withstand anything thrown at it. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.description: This vertical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being blackout, it is great for stopping any light from passing through the fabric - great for living rooms and bedrooms. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.
